name: GammaWar
description:
Hello everyone, here I present my game GammaWar. It took me about 24 hours to do it, I know the Gotm.io game jam started almost 2 weeks ago but I am a busy man.

In Gamma War you can destroy everything as long as the color of your tank is the same as the object .

In html the game is a bit annoying to play, but the executables work very well, if you can't play in the browser you can download the game, give it a try. What counts in a game jam is the game itself, not where you play it.

I know the game jam instructions say to upload the game to gotm.io, and I did, but for some reason it doesn't load the game. So I upload the HTML directly to itch.io.

I follow the instruction, upload the game to gotm.io, dowload the embed file, upload the embed file.... for me did not work.

I would love to have started earlier to avoid technical difficulties like this one.

Here is the link to Gotm.io

https://gotm.io/manuelnaim/gammawar
